name: Shmovement
description:
Working on and off this project for over a year now, this is my first published game.

Shmovement is an elaborate 3D platformer with 1.5-2 hours of gameplay. Expand your moveset by collecting power-ups, allowing you to reach further parts of each level with ease. Each level is filled with collectibles behind challenging detours from the main path.

(Nearly) all assets were made by me.

More levels will be added in the future.
